title: Sann-Remy - Senior Front-end Engineer
description: Sann-Remy is a seasoned Front-end Engineer, located in Paris, France. He has been working in the video games industry, as a professional, for more than 9 years.
experience: Experienced contributor to leading Video Game companies: Activision Blizzard and Ubisoft.
skills: Specialised in UI, Node.js and AWS.
